english.segment1: the morning comes. I've not yet closed my eyes. cold and bright as I need it. the sun does rise
english.segment2: these were my thoughts as I. passed neath your window. saw you through stained glass. with only one eye
english.segment3: hide me in your hand. with the mother of my children. where the land sinks deep in it's color. bless the ground where we kneel. safe in your woven creel. we follow for you speak. you speak as no other
english.segment4: no one asked any questions. for fear that I might answer. they covered their ears to your song
english.segment5: have I shown them compassion. have I shown them any love. I hope they know it come. from the father above
english.segment6: self righteous self pity. this I do not doubt. bind and turn the strong man out. for you know my frame. the sound of my new name. as I hold forth nothing worth saving
english.segment7: for I am everything. I am everything. I am everything that he is not.
